description.en:
A collection of three stories of love and the supernatural:

I. [b]Desert Storm[/b]: It's four years after the Chechnya revolt against Russian rule. Eimi finds a mysterious boy who speaks Japanese, just like her father. Because he can't recall who he is she calls him "Yuuji." And Yuuji's strange powers tell Eimi her first crush is still alive...
*Related to [i]Silent Eye[/i]

II. [b]The Garden of Wild Roses[/b]: Garden designer Shindo Chika is surrounded by mystery. One by one people she knows are injured or suddenly die. The only clue she has is a boy with a scarred face--whom she fears is a shinigami.
*Related to [i][url=https://mangadex.org/title/4001/]Towa Kamoshirenai[/url][/i]

III. [b]Sunset Encounter[/b]: Ryuugi dreams each year on his birthday of a girl named Fumika who he loved as a boy name Sou, and another boy named Keishi, who kills him. But when the people from his dreams keep appearing and he starts dreaming events that take place while he dreams, then he begins to wonder what exactly is happening.
